task02CaesarCipher

Class CaesarCipher

  • java.lang.Object
    • task02CaesarCipher.CaesarCipher

  • public class CaesarCipher
extends java.lang.Object
    The main goal of using class CaesarCipher is to convert ciphered message with caesar algotithm into decrypted message using Force method Result can contains some decrypted messages. Human has to read and choose the most suitable.

      • decryptForce

        public java.util.Map<java.lang.Integer,java.lang.StringBuilder> decryptForce()
        Metod iterates to decrypt the message 25 times
        Returns:
        probableDecryptedMessage There can be some decrypted messages. Human has to read and chose the most suitable.

      • getShiftedMessages

        public java.lang.StringBuilder getShiftedMessages(int shift)
        Method shifts each character of message and creates guessMessage with shifting characters. Spaces are kept.
        Parameters:
        shift - number of shifting each character of message
        Returns:
        guessMessage containes created message shifted at shift number times

      • circularShift

        public int circularShift(int cipheredChar,
                         int shift)
        circularShift provides circular shifting of one shift position
        Parameters:
        cipheredChar - character that sholud to be shifted
        shift - number of circular shifting of character
        Returns:
        character after shifting
